desc: This spacious home is located in a desirable neighborhood and offers the ideal blend of comfort, convenience, and entertainment possibilities. This 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom home is situated on a spacious lot with a two-car garage, and extra wide driveway. As you step inside, you will be greeted by a cozy living space that exudes warmth and character. This cozy home features a practical layout that provides ample space for a growing family and/or guests. In addition to the cozy living area, the home also features a formal living room, perfect for hosting guests or enjoying quiet evenings with loved ones. The home also features custom shelving throughout for more storage. The heart of the home is the well-appointed kitchen, a chef's paradise boasting durable Corian countertops, (some) stainless-steel appliances, lots of cabinet space, and a small custom bar area, ideal for hosting gatherings or enjoying casual meals with loved ones. There is a breakfast nook next to the kitchen with sliding doors that open up to the screened porch that you can enjoy year-round. Outside, youll find a spacious fenced-in backyard, complete with a storage shed, offering plenty of room for outdoor activities, gardening, or simply relaxing in the shade. The roof was replaced in 2010, HVAC 2020. This home also has hurricane shutters. Located near shopping, dining, parks, entertainment, and top-rated schools

This beautiful 4 bedroom, 2 full baths, 1 half bath home is located on a corner lot in the desirable Coastal Woods subdivision. On the main floor you will find the kitchen, dining room, bonus/flex room, living room, and half bath. On the second floor you will find four bedrooms, two full baths, the laundry room, attic access and a large loft. The master bath includes double sinks, a private toilet, shower, a large walk-in closet and a linen closet. The spare bath contains double sinks and a tub/shower. This home offers tile floors downstairs, pet and waterproof carpet upstairs (installed 2022), various automatic and dimmer lights downstairs, lots of storage space on both floors, kitchen with tiled back splash, walk-in pantry, and a large island. Home has a fresh air ventilation system (AprilAire Home). The backyard is fully fenced with white vinyl fencing which has a double gate on the south side. The backyard also contains a 50-amp generator hookup, a covered porch and an open area, both with pavers. The gazebo conveys as well! The HOA fee includes community maintenance, the community pool and playgrounds.

Spacious one-story villa in the desirable Briarwood at Suntree, which offers a community pool with bathrooms, a water fountain, a covered patio, chase loungers and umbrellas. Being a resident, you are allowed to join Suntree's HOA (additional fees) that offers 36 holes of Championship golf, a state-of-the-art short game practice facility, 8 lighted tennis courts and a club house! Roof is 2 years new! You will enter this home through a large, tiled courtyard. This home has an open floor plan with two large bedrooms, two full bathrooms, a two-car garage, kitchen with a breakfast nook & plenty of cabinet and countertop space, an indoor laundry with plenty of cabinets for storage, living room, dining room & a family/florida room, multiple skylights that allow for natural light throughout, multiple storage closets, hurricane shutters & a sprinkler system. The large master bedroom has a walk-in closet & an additional closet.The master bathroom has a tub & separate shower, double sinks & a large linen closet. This home is located near shopping, dining, banking, healthcare, schools, entertainment, vehicle care & much more. HOA covers roof replacement, insurance, exterior maintenance, lake/irrigation maintenance, community pool, pest control & termite bond.

Beacon Hills tri-level with BASEMENT at the end of a cul-de-sac! This 4 bedroom 2.5 bathroom on almost 1/2 acre has endless possibilities! You will enter this home through the double door entry to find the living, dining and kitchen area. Upstairs will encompass the spacious master suite with his/hers closet, renovated bathroom with walk in shower, 2 guest bedrooms, renovated guest bathroom, and two storage closets. On the bottom floor you will find a private bedroom with ensuite half bath and sliders out to the patio. The two-car garage provides ample room for your cars, toys, and/or storage. Then as a bonus, there is a 400+ sq ft basement (not included on the tax roll) just waiting for some creative ideas for playroom, man cave, craft room, or whatever you may need extra space for. Back yard has chicken coop already in place so you can gather those fresh eggs! Newer roof and HVAC system. What are you waiting for, call now!

Watch the next rocket launch from your new backyard! This freshly painted 2 bedroom 2 bathroom home with additional bonus room is looking for its new owners. This floorplan features an eat-in kitchen, living room, enclosed Florida room, additional storage room under air, and wood flooring throughout. 1 car garage with laundry area & additional space. Nice sized fenced backyard equipped with 2 sheds for storage, 1 with electric. Washer/dryer, garage refrigerator, & mini refrigerator all convey. Roof 2015, AC 2018, and septic tank pumped last month. Don't miss your opportunity to take advantage of all this home has to offer!

This beautiful 3/2.5 pool home sits on 1+ acre nestled in a secluded private wooded sanctuary. Home features a whole house Onan generator, new carpet in the living room, fireplace, a heated 15X30 pool, completely screened in with a large porch. Master bedroom has access to the pool and has his and hers walk in closets. Spacious 3 car garage and a detached workshop/studio that can easily be converted to a guest /in-law suite.

Welcome to your Energy-Efficient Oasis - Spectacular, 4BR/2BA spacious, custom pool home nestled in a gated, quiet HOA community. This beautifully maintained home features an open floor plan with vaulted ceilings, and formal living and dining rooms. The large family room, adorned with a wood burning stone fireplace, is perfect for gatherings. The heart of the home boasts refinished kitchen cabinets (2021), granite countertops and a convenient walk-in pantry. Separate laundry room off kitchen and garage. A stunning heated in-ground swimming pool with jacuzzi makes this area your retreat from a long day. The pool patio has an extra-large screened-in lanai, with an outdoor kitchen, and a fenced in yard for privacy. Reclaimed water system waters yard and landscaping. Roof (12 yrs.), solar panels (3 yrs.), AC (new) and gas appliances (water and pool heater and stove/range). This home offers easy access to schools, shopping, dining, and entertainment.

Almost new 2022 built home in Hickory Ridge - owner hardly lived in the house due to traveling/working. A spacious 4 bedroom, 2 bath home with a 2 car garage. Entering the home from a covered porch area into the formal dining room with large windows. An open floor plan with 10' vaulted ceilings. Kitchen has an island & features 36'' all wood Cabinets w/crown molding, Moen faucets, stainless steel appliances & pantry. Large owner's suite with a large walk-in closet, separate shower, and garden tub. Fourth bedroom perfect for a Home Office with tons of light & home also includes a covered lanai. Taexx pest prevention system, double pane (low E) windows w/ Storm Shutters, and so much more. Energy Efficient w/ 10-year structural, builder and manufacturer warranties all included. Home is conveniently located to the Beachline to the airport & beaches or interstate. Close to medical, shopping, schools & restaurants.
Double lot on a corner available to build your new home in an up and coming community . 150 Feet of road frontage on 2 sides

Location, Location, Location!! Welcome to Fern Meadows subdivision where you will find this nicely appointed split plan 3 bedroom 2 bath home. As you enter the foyer area there is a formal living and dining room that leads you into the kitchen and great room area. Spacious kitchen has stainless appliances, breakfast bar and built in office/homework nook. The great room has ceramic tile flooring and sliding shutters/door to screened in back patio. The master bedroom boasts a walk in shower, garden tub, and walk in closet. The guest bedrooms have a small den area between that can be used for play/sitting area. There is an Inside laundry/utility room, 2 car garage, and white vinyl privacy fenced back yard. Great location for commuting to all major highways, central Florida, beaches, and the Kennedy Space Center.
